author: ryanleeschneider
content:
ropsten has had several large reorgs this week, including a 500 block one last night:

```
Mar 18 03:08:03 ip-10-0-67-37 geth[3404892]: INFO [03-18|03:08:03.721] Importing sidechain segment              start=12,100,883 end=12,101,172
Mar 18 03:08:04 ip-10-0-67-37 geth[3404892]: WARN [03-18|03:08:04.601] Large chain reorg detected               number=12,100,678 hash=5d6ede..30d244 drop=500 dropfrom=9a7cde..85951e add=485 add>
```

As such I'd feel a little dishonest using a ~128 block old value on that network.
